caption: Fra Angelico’s Annunciation (mid-1430s)
description: Fra Angelico's depiction of the Annunciation, showcasing the moment the Angel Gabriel announces to Mary she will bear the Son of God.
subject: The Annunciation to the Virgin Mary
title: Annunciation

caption: Rembrandt's The Visitation
description: Rembrandt's portrayal of the Visitation, capturing the emotional meeting between Mary and Elizabeth.
subject: The Visitation of Mary to Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Giovanni Antonio Pellegrini's The Nativity
description: Pellegrini's depiction of the Nativity, illustrating the humble birth of Jesus in Bethlehem.
subject: The birth of Jesus Christ
title: The Nativity

caption: Fresco of Presentation in the Temple in Chiesa di Santa Rita by Giulio Campi (1547)
description: Campi's fresco captures the moment Mary and Joseph present the infant Jesus at the Temple in Jerusalem.
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
subject: The presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Presentation in the Temple

caption: Finding of Jesus in the Temple mosaic from Lourdes Basilica, France
description: This mosaic depicts the moment Mary and Joseph find Jesus teaching in the Temple after searching for him for three days.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: The finding of Jesus in the Temple
title: Finding of Jesus in the Temple

caption: An unknown artist’s fresco, Baptism of Christ, in Padua’s church of San Benedetto
description: This fresco illustrates the baptism of Jesus in the Jordan River by John the Baptist, a pivotal moment in Christian theology.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: The baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist
title: Baptism of Christ

caption: Carl Bloch’s The Wedding at Cana
description: Bloch's painting captures the moment Jesus turns water into wine at the wedding at Cana, his first public miracle.
subject: The wedding at Cana where Jesus performed his first miracle
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: James Tissot’s Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum
description: Tissot's watercolor depicts Jesus healing lepers in Capernaum, showcasing his compassion and divine power.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Jesus healing the lepers at Capernaum
title: Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum

caption: Transfiguration in Vienna’s Votive Church
description: This artwork depicts the transfiguration of Jesus, revealing his divine glory to Peter, James, and John on Mount Tabor.
subject: The transfiguration of Jesus on Mount Tabor
title: Transfiguration

caption: Giacomo Raffaelli (1753-1836) , an Italian mosaicist, created a life-sized mosaic copy of Leonardo da Vinci's The Last Supper
description: Raffaelli's mosaic reproduces Leonardo da Vinci's iconic Last Supper, capturing the moment Jesus announces his betrayal.
subject: The Last Supper of Jesus with his disciples
title: The Last Supper

caption: Agony in the Garden by Vicente Masip, also known as Vicente Juan Masip
description: A depiction of Jesus in deep prayer in the Garden of Gethsemane, moments before his arrest.
subject: Jesus praying in the Garden of Gethsemane
title: Agony in the Garden

caption: Giovanni Antonio Bazzi known as Sodoma, Christ at the Column (c. 1510-1515; detached fresco, 140 x 101 cm; Siena, Pinacoteca Nazionale)
description: A fresco depicting Jesus bound to a column during his scourging, showcasing his suffering and patience.
subject: Jesus being scourged at the column
title: Christ at the Column

caption: Titian’s Christ Crowned with Thorns (c. 1542–1543)
description: A powerful portrayal of Jesus enduring the mockery and pain of the crown of thorns.
subject: Jesus being crowned with thorns
title: Christ Crowned with Thorns

caption: Pieter Bruegel the Elder’s The Procession to Calvary (1564)
description: A detailed scene of Jesus carrying his cross amidst a crowd, highlighting his journey to crucifixion.
subject: Jesus carrying the cross to Calvary
title: The Procession to Calvary

caption: The fresco of Crucifixion in the church San Girolamo dei Croati by Pietro Gagliardi (1847-1852)
description: A fresco depicting the crucifixion of Jesus, emphasizing his sacrifice for humanity.
location: Church San Girolamo dei Croati, Rome
subject: The crucifixion of Jesus
title: Crucifixion

caption: Resurrection (1593) by Annibale Carracci
description: A depiction of Jesus rising from the dead, symbolizing victory over death.
subject: The resurrection of Jesus
title: Resurrection

caption: Crossing (Ascension) cupola 1175-1200 Mosaic Basilica di San Marco, Venice
description: A mosaic illustrating Jesus ascending into heaven, surrounded by apostles and angels.
subject: The ascension of Jesus into heaven
title: Ascension

caption: “Pentecost” by Jean Restout II (1692–1768)
description: A depiction of the Holy Spirit descending upon the apostles, empowering them to spread the Gospel.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon the apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Assumption of Virgin Mary in the main cupola in Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto by Giuseppe and Andrea Orazi 1706
description: A fresco showing the Virgin Mary being assumed into heaven, surrounded by angels.
location: Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto, Rome
subject: The assumption of the Virgin Mary into heaven
title: The Assumption of Virgin Mary

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, a painting on oil on canvas by Diego Velázquez of the Holy Trinity crowning the Blessed Virgin Mary, at the Museo del Prado
description: A painting depicting the Virgin Mary being crowned by the Holy Trinity, symbolizing her queenship of heaven.
subject: The coronation of the Virgin Mary by the Holy Trinity
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: The Annunciation, an 1898 painting by African-American painter Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: A depiction of the Angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Son of God, blending realism with spiritual symbolism.
subject: The Annunciation
title: The Annunciation

caption: The painting of Visitation in the church Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio by Federico Maldarelli (1889)
description: Depicts the Virgin Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, both pregnant with Jesus and John the Baptist, respectively.
location: Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio, Naples, Italy
subject: The Visitation
title: Visitation

caption: Gerard van Honthorst - Adoration of the Shepherds (1622)
description: A Baroque depiction of shepherds adoring the newborn Jesus, emphasizing light and divine presence.
subject: The Adoration of the Shepherds
title: Adoration of the Shepherds

caption: The painting of Presentation of Jesus in the Temple in church kostel Svatého Havla by unknown baroque artist
description: A Baroque artwork depicting Mary and Joseph presenting the infant Jesus in the Temple, fulfilling Jewish law.
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
subject: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
title: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple

caption: Jesus, at 12, teaching in the Temple
description: Depicts a young Jesus engaging with teachers in the Temple, showcasing his wisdom and divine nature.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Jesus teaching in the Temple at age 12
title: Jesus Teaching in the Temple

artist: Leonardo Da Vinci and Andrea del Verrochio
caption: The Baptism of Christ by Leonardo Da Vinci created in the studio of Andrea del Verrochio around 1475
description: A Renaissance masterpiece depicting Jesus' baptism, highlighting divine approval with the dove symbolizing the Holy Spirit.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: The Baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist
title: The Baptism of Christ

caption: Gerard David's The Marriage at Cana
description: Depicts Jesus performing his first miracle by turning water into wine at a wedding in Cana.
subject: The Wedding at Cana
title: The Marriage at Cana

caption: The Adulterous Woman by Lorenzo Lotto
description: A Renaissance painting showing Jesus' mercy towards an adulterous woman, challenging societal norms.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Jesus and the Adulterous Woman
title: The Adulterous Woman

caption: Raphael's The Transfiguration
description: A High Renaissance masterpiece depicting Jesus transfigured on Mount Tabor, witnessed by Peter, James, and John.
subject: The Transfiguration of Jesus
title: The Transfiguration

caption: The Last Supper by Juan de Juanes
description: A Renaissance depiction of Jesus' last meal with his apostles, emphasizing the institution of the Eucharist.
subject: The Last Supper
title: The Last Supper

caption: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane by Alessandro Maganza
description: A depiction of Jesus praying in the Garden of Gethsemane, capturing the moment of spiritual struggle before His arrest.
subject: Jesus praying in the Garden of Gethsemane
title: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane

caption: The Flagellation of Christ: Painting by Caravaggio
description: A powerful Baroque depiction of Christ being scourged, highlighting Caravaggio's mastery of light and shadow.
subject: The flagellation of Christ
title: The Flagellation of Christ

caption: Caravaggio's Ecce Homo - Behold The Man
description: Caravaggio's depiction of Pontius Pilate presenting Christ to the crowd with the words 'Ecce Homo' (Behold the Man).
subject: Pontius Pilate presenting Christ to the people
title: Ecce Homo

caption: The Lost Caravaggio - Ecce Homo
description: A lost version of Caravaggio's 'Ecce Homo', depicting Christ presented to the crowd by Pontius Pilate.
subject: Pontius Pilate presenting Christ to the people
title: Ecce Homo

caption: Christ carrying the Cross (1605) by Orazio Gentileschi
description: A Baroque portrayal of Christ's journey to Calvary, emphasizing His suffering and sacrifice.
subject: Christ carrying the cross to Calvary
title: Christ carrying the Cross

caption: James Tissot's What Our Lord Saw From The Cross
description: A realistic depiction of the crucifixion scene from Christ's perspective on the cross.
original_title: Ce que voyait Notre-Seigneur sur la Croix
subject: The view from the cross during Christ's crucifixion
title: What Our Lord Saw From The Cross

caption: Caravaggio's The Incredulity of St. Thomas
description: A Baroque masterpiece depicting St. Thomas's doubt and Christ's invitation to touch His wounds.
subject: St. Thomas touching Christ's wounds after His resurrection
title: The Incredulity of St. Thomas

caption: Ascension of the Lord by Bernardino Gandino
description: A depiction of Christ's ascension into heaven, symbolizing His return to the Father.
subject: The ascension of Christ into heaven
title: Ascension of the Lord

caption: Pentecost by Titian
description: A Renaissance masterpiece depicting the Holy Spirit descending upon the Apostles at Pentecost.
location: Santa Maria della Salute, Venice, Italy
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon the Apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: Fresco of Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure in the church Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone by Cesare Mariani (1863)
description: A fresco depicting the Assumption of the Virgin Mary as envisioned by St. Bonaventure.
location: Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone, Rome, Italy
subject: The Assumption of the Virgin Mary
title: Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, fresco by Giuseppe Mattia Borgnis
description: A fresco depicting the Virgin Mary's coronation as Queen of Heaven by Giuseppe Mattia Borgnis.
subject: Coronation of the Virgin Mary
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: Basilica of the Visitation in Ein Karem, a village in the hill country of Judea where John the Baptist was born
description: Depicts the biblical scene of Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, both pregnant with Jesus and John the Baptist.
location: Basilica of the Visitation, Ein Karem
subject: Visitation of Mary to Elizabeth
title: Mary Visits Elizabeth

caption: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence by Caravaggio
description: A Baroque painting by Caravaggio depicting the Nativity of Jesus with Saints Francis and Lawrence.
subject: Nativity of Jesus with Saints Francis and Lawrence
title: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence

caption: Simeon's Song of Praise by Arent de Gelder
description: Depicts Simeon praising God upon seeing the infant Jesus during the Presentation at the Temple.
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
subject: Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Simeon's Song of Praise

caption: Finding of the Savior in the Temple by William Holman Hunt
description: A Pre-Raphaelite painting depicting the moment Mary and Joseph find Jesus teaching in the Temple.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Finding of Jesus in the Temple
title: The Finding of the Saviour in the Temple

caption: Apparition of the Messiah, an oil painting on canvas, measuring 540 cm × 750 cm, by Russian painter Alexander Andreyevich Ivanov (1806–1858)
description: A monumental painting depicting John the Baptist pointing to the approaching Christ, symbolizing the Messiah's first appearance.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Apparition of Christ to the People
title: Apparition of the Messiah

caption: Wedding at Cana by Paolo Veronese
description: A Renaissance masterpiece depicting Jesus performing his first miracle by turning water into wine at a wedding in Cana.
subject: Wedding at Cana
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: Christ in the Storm on the Sea of Galilee, a 1633 oil-on-canvas painting by the Dutch Golden Age painter Rembrandt van Rijn
description: Rembrandt's only seascape depicts the biblical story of Jesus calming the storm on the Sea of Galilee.
location: Stolen, previously at Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
subject: Christ calming the storm on the Sea of Galilee
title: The Storm on the Sea of Galilee

caption: The Savior’s Transfiguration by Theophanes the Greek
description: A Byzantine fresco depicting Jesus transfigured on Mount Tabor, with Moses and Elijah appearing beside him.
subject: Transfiguration of Jesus
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper by Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: Depicts Jesus and his disciples in a moment of reflection before the Last Supper, highlighting their bond.
subject: Last Supper preparation
title: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper

caption: The Arrest of Christ Kiss of Judas by Giotto
description: Giotto's fresco captures the moment of betrayal as Judas identifies Jesus with a kiss, leading to His arrest.
subject: The betrayal of Jesus by Judas
title: The Arrest of Christ (Kiss of Judas)

caption: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ by Bouguereau
description: Bouguereau's painting depicts the brutal flagellation of Christ, emphasizing His suffering and sacrifice.
original_title: La Flagellation de Notre Seigneur Jésus-Christ
subject: The scourging of Jesus before His crucifixion
title: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ

caption: Van Dyck's _The Crowning with Thorns_ (early 17th century), a Baroque depiction of Christ's suffering and paradoxical triumph
description: Van Dyck's work portrays Christ's humiliation and pain as soldiers crown Him with thorns, a moment of profound suffering.
subject: The mocking of Jesus with a crown of thorns
title: The Crowning with Thorns

caption: Raphael's Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary, a painting depicting Christ stumbling under the cross with Mary and a crowd witnessing
description: Raphael's painting captures the moment Christ stumbles under the cross's weight, with Mary and onlookers sharing in His suffering.
original_title: Caduta di Cristo sulla via del Calvario
subject: Christ's fall under the weight of the cross
title: Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary

caption: The Descent from the Cross (1616-1617) by Rubens: A dynamic, dramatic depiction of Christ's descent
description: Rubens' masterpiece vividly depicts the emotional and physical intensity of Christ's descent from the cross.
location: Cathedral of Our Lady, Antwerp, Belgium
mystery_name: The Crucifixion and Death of Our Lord
subject: The removal of Christ's body from the cross
title: The Descent from the Cross

caption: The Three Marys at the Tomb by Annibale Carracci, 17th century at Hermitage Museum, reveals Baroque vividness and drama
description: Carracci's painting captures the moment the Marys find Christ's tomb empty, a scene of awe and revelation.
subject: The discovery of Christ's empty tomb
title: The Three Marys at the Tomb

caption: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles by Duccio, 14th century, Museo dell'Opera, tempera on wood, Gothic details
description: Duccio's panel depicts Christ's emotional farewell to His apostles, a moment of parting and promise.
location: Museo dell'Opera del Duomo, Siena, Italy
subject: Christ's farewell to His apostles before the Ascension
title: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles

caption: Simone Peterzano's Pentecost depicts the Virgin and disciples receiving the Holy Spirit in Mannerist style
description: Peterzano's work illustrates the dramatic moment the Holy Spirit descends, empowering the Virgin and disciples.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon the Virgin and apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Divine Exchange Between Mother and Son
description: This stained glass window depicts the Virgin Mary's assumption into heaven, a moment of divine glory.
subject: The Assumption of the Virgin Mary into heaven
title: The Assumption of Mary

caption: Mary, Help of Christians by Giuseppe Rollini
description: Rollini's fresco portrays the Virgin Mary as a compassionate helper and protector of the faithful.
subject: The Virgin Mary as protector and helper of Christians
title: Mary, Help of Christians
